summary: Changes Fastred to have red hair, and puts her in the PotentialMarriage Faction.
descriptionHtml:
Fastred should have red hair unless her name is Fastbrown, which its not, so I decided to change it.  I made her marriageable, but not a follower, there\'s enough followers, including mine.  I also set her to Essential, the reason is further down.

SPOILER IF YOU\'VE NOT DONE THE BOOK OF LOVE QUEST:

When I last did the book of love quest, I had her marry Klimmek, I went back afterward to check, and she was still working in the garden.  When I talked to her she commented on the Amulet of Mara, and I had the options to lead to marriage.

UPDATE:  Uploaded a different version, gave her darker red hair, I just didn\'t like the orange looking hair, a different Apachii hairstyle, and added freckles.  Any freckles complexion should work, the one in the picture is Cute Freckles by Zhoken, here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/515

Also, I checked after talking to Bassianus instead of Klimmek, and she was in Riften with Bassianus.  When I talked to her I got the option to ask her to marry me with Bassianus sitting in the background, guess she\'s still kind of fickle.

Not sure how it would work with Bassianus, but I\'ll test it when I get the chance.  I think you\'d still get the option to marry her, but if you don\'t like her spouse hanging around Riften, I read here http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Fastred that if you kill Bassianus in Riften, and the guards attack you, she will defend you and die, that\'s why I made her essential.  If you sheath your weapon, and pay any bounty, that should be the end of it, but like I said I\'ve not tested it.

To look like she does in the pictures:
DIMONIZED UNP female body UNP Base Main body V1dot2 by dimon99 here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Better Females version 3 Makeup Version 3 and No Shine by BellaGail here 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Natural Eyes with Elves Alternative Eyes by nevenbridge here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589
Her clothes are default, but if you want her look like the pictures use UNP - Ultra Skimpy Armor by 

Nightasy here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9546

I didn\'t use any color extenders, I simply made a hair color in her esp.

Installation is easiest with NMM
Or if you want to install manually extract someplace, click on CGTammy, copy the data folder, and paste it 

in your Skyrim folder.

Uninstall with NMM if you used NMM to install
Or if installed manually:
Delete:
Skyrim\\Data\\CGFastred.esp
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Actor\\Character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\Skyrim.esm\\000136BF.NIF
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Actor\\Character\\facegendata\\facetint\\Skyrim.esm\\000136BF.dds and 000136BF.tga

Any requests for changes I\'ll try to accommodate, but changing faces\\editing NPCs in the CK is tricky, and 

can corrupt the file to point its unusable.

Credits
dimon99 for the best body
BellaGail for her face textures
nevenbridge for the great eyes
Nightasy for the great meshes on gear and his tutorials for making gear.
Apachii for the awesome hairs.
author: CrimsonGeezer
